messages.how-hero-subtitle: The iOS app that really teaches your kids handwriting since 2014.
messages.how-hero-text: Your kid likes to spend time with your iPad anyway, let’s use that time to teach them handwriting! We designed our app with input from educational professionals and feedback from 100 kids. Both sound and interface help make learning easy and efficient.
messages.how-plate-text: Kids write the same letter several times — the only way to develop muscle memory. We adapt the difficulty of letter tracing to each child progress at the time.
messages.how-details-benefit-0: Your kid is fully prepared for Kindergarten and will have no issues with grades at school;
messages.how-details-benefit-1: You will get some free time for yourself while your kid is learning;
messages.how-details-benefit-2: You will know exactly the progress of your child — how much time they spend in the app and what kind of mistakes they make;
messages.how-details-benefit-3: Teach your children with one app — we have unlimited children accounts for all your family;
messages.how-details-benefit-4: iTrace maintains a history of every attempt made by each player, so parents or teachers can easily review kids progress.
messages.features-letters-item-text-0: Zaner-Blosser, HWT (Handwriting Without Tears) and DNealian. We checked — that are the most popular methodologies in the USA
messages.features-letters-item-title-1: One app for all letters and numbers
messages.features-letters-item-text-1: Uppercase and lowercase, cursive and block, letters and numbers. There is no need to buy 3 different apps to teach your kid just handwriting.
messages.features-letters-item-text-2: Just switch in the Parents Zone. We learned that left-handed people write letters differently: right-handed students pull the pen and left-handed push it before hand.
messages.features-letters-item-text-3: No other app is that generous. Get rewarded for each practicing and improving.
messages.features-words-item-text-0: The proper handwriting of a child’s name is an indication that your kid is ready for other words.
messages.features-words-item-text-1: We have already uploaded 350 words for practicing, and you can add an unlimited number of yours.
messages.features-words-item-text-2: 50 animated objects on iPad that make learning fun — Kids LOVE to interact with.
messages.options-free-description: Free version with in-app purchases — to see whether your kid like our app or not.
messages.options-free-text: 3 letters, 2 numbers and 2 pre-uploaded words available for free, and the rest — after the purchase
messages.options-paid-description: A paid version with all content available right after install
messages.options-paid-text: Eligible for Family Sharing — up to six family members can use this app.
messages.privacy-description: We are conscious about kids privacy, we do not want to violate the confidentiality of children.
messages.privacy-features-text-0: We don’t show any unwelcome messages for your kids. We don’t like that either.
messages.privacy-features-text-1: There is no unexpected spending with our app.
messages.privacy-features-text-2: We don’t know who is your kid, what’s their real name and what school do they go to.
messages.privacy-cta-title: Download the app to check it
messages.start-learning-text: Tracing letters and numbers is a huge part of early childhood education. iTrace makes that part interesting and fun for kids.
messages.schools-hero-text-1: iTrace is an iOS app that teaches kids handwriting at school and was created with input of educational experts.
messages.schools-hero-text-2: Our app was downloaded via the Volume Purchase Program more than 1 000 000 times by schools around the world.  It is used in dozens of school districts and helps teachers to explain handwriting.
messages.schools-plate-title: What is in there for schools
messages.schools-plate-text: Handwriting lesson is not so boring anymore. Combine teacher explanation and kids tracing in the app to get children really learning.
messages.schools-details-benefit-0: Available at a 50% price with Volume Purchase Program for educational institutions for more than 20 app units;
messages.schools-details-benefit-1: Teachers can check the history of every attempt made by each kid to review their success;
messages.schools-details-benefit-2: 3 style fonts: Zaner-Blosser, HWT (Handwriting Without Tears) and D'Nealian. We checked — that are the most popular methodologies in the USA.  Also, you can even customize letters in letter options;
messages.schools-details-benefit-3: We are strict about privacy — we don’t collect any personal data, we don’t show any ads on our app;
messages.schools-details-benefit-4: Uppercase and lowercase, cursive and block, letters and numbers — all in one app. There is no need to buy 3 different apps to teach your children handwriting.
messages.schools-purchase-title: If you want to buy our app for your school via the Volume Purchase Program, here is your link:
messages.schools-purchase-text: In case you use our app at your school, please, contact us. We would love to hear your feedback or suggestions.
messages.home-hero-subtitle: iTrace — the iOS app that teaches your homeschoolers handwriting.
messages.home-hero-text: We know It is hard to teach kids at home. To make at least handwriting easier we designed iTrace with educational experts and feedback from almost 100 kids.
messages.home-plate-title: ITrace really helps homeschoolers to learn handwriting
messages.home-plate-text: Letters, numbers and words — all in one app, that kids are fond of.
messages.home-details-benefit-0: Really teaches handwriting - it won’t need your time for explaining and supervising. Just open our app for 15 minutes and then check results;
messages.home-details-benefit-1: Tracking a child's progress on each letter or number to help them master the handwriting and for adults to see the improvement in each tricky letter;
messages.home-details-benefit-2: Easy switches to the left-handed mode and cursive letters in Letter options;
messages.home-details-benefit-3: Teach your children with one app — we have unlimited children accounts for all your family;
messages.home-details-benefit-4: Customizes and prints PDF worksheets for continuing practicing on paper — no need to search for worksheets on the Internet.
messages.about-hero-text-1: iTrace was developed by a group of professionals that wanted to make education more interactive and less boring.
messages.about-hero-text-2: A few years back we found out that handwriting still is required in schools and yet is taught like it was in the 80s. So we decided to use a chance to change it. It took us a year to develop an app and to test it with teachers and kids.
messages.team-text: Here is a team that has been helping us to create iTrace.
messages.how-review-text: Since publishing we have been getting a lot of great reviews on our app:

messages.home-review-text: In case you are already using our app, please share your feedback with us — email us or leave a review on the Apple Store. We are interested in making the product that really helps homeschoolers. Your feedback is the best way to do it:
messages.how-review-item-text-0: I use this app for tutoring 4-6 year olds Many apps have busy graphics and annoying rewards that can kill concentration, but this app has very clean and simple graphics, with the optional pleasant background music. The creator really strives to make this a great learning tool for children.
messages.how-review-item-text-1: I tried out several handwriting apps before settling on this one. This is really the best one out there! I really like the self-correcting feature that helps children learn to keep their lines within the space and correct stroke order. I love the ability to add words for my daughter to practice spelling and writing.
messages.how-review-item-text-2: This app is engaging and really has helped my older daughter with her handwriting skills. Now I'm using this same app with her little sister to improve her skills also.
messages.schools-review-item-text-0: The app is brightly illustrated and well designed, certain to appeal to young students. Meant for the core 3-7 age group, kids can learn to trace uppercase and lower-case letters, as well as numbers.
messages.schools-review-item-text-1: This app is what every parent/teacher should have their children use to help learn proper letter formation. As a teacher, it helps fit handwriting into the school day so much easier!
messages.schools-review-item-text-2: …kids LOVE everything electronic. iTrace will make learning how to write letters, numbers, and words, both fun and interesting for your children
